doc.name: DatabaseInsert
doc.description: Insert the input arrays of records into the specified table. The table needs to exist in the database and have columns with the same names as the record field names. This actor optionally clears the table in its initialize() method. If no errors occur during insertion, then it commits the changes in its wrapup() method.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: If true, clear the table at initialization of the model. This is a boolean that defaults to false.
Name of the DatabaseManager to use. This defaults to "DatabaseManager".
Name of the table to set. This defaults to "v_people".
